mapper.insert: INSERT INTO salib.acoderp (adgub, asgub, asdes) VALUES('BD', #{code}, #{group})
mapper.select: SELECT asgub AS code, asdes AS name FROM salib.acoderp WHERE adgub='BD' ORDER BY asgub
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO salib.acoderp (adgub, asgub, asdes) VALUES('BS', #{code}, #{group})
mapper.select: SELECT asgub AS code, asdes AS name FROM salib.acoderp WHERE adgub='BS' ORDER BY asgub
